name: PINBALL TRIO
description:
*Pinball Trio features arcade-like gameplay with Multi-ball action.
Play balls at once in these cool-looking arcade-style Pinball game and
watch the Pinball Trio light up with special FX.
Trio pinball features a ball rescue button. Save your ball whenever you feel like for continuous non-stop gameplay.

*Pinball Trio features eight triggers for non-stop action.
Equipped with cool special FX and retro-modern sound FX, Pinball Trio delivers the fun and excitement you been waiting for.

*Enjoy Over edge electricity FX.

*Pinball Trio is an eye candy machine to entertain even the most
dedicated Pinball players.

Try Time Marker Mobile's uniquely designed Pinhole/Pinball free arcade series today.


RULES:
The goal of the game is to press the TRIO RESCUE button before the ball falls inside the game over the hole.



FEATURES:
•Trio Rescue button (save the ball at any time)
•Unique and friendly game visuals
•8 flippers
•Play 3 balls at the same time
•Relaxing original soundtrack
